mapper.insert: insert into t_stock_log(id, hold_date, stock_code, stock_name, market_value, pl, pl_percent, position, available_num, cost, current_price, create_time) values(#{id}, #{holdDate}, #{stockCode}, #{stockName}, #{marketValue}, #{pl}, #{plPercent}, #{position}, #{availableNum}, #{cost}, #{currentPrice}, #{createTime})
